form.LN:
Običajna oblika od
shall not
je v govoru
shan't
.

sense.def:
Izraz
shall
uporabljamo za dejanja, ki jih nameravamo storiti ali se nam bodo zgodila v prihodnosti.

seg.quote: I shall get angry in a moment.
It must be done and therefore it shall be done.
You're here to enjoy yourself, and enjoy yourself you shall.
No more drink shall be drunk tonight.

sense.def:
Izraz
shall
uporabljamo v vprašanjih, kadar prosimo za nasvet.

seg.quote: Where shall we go for our drink?

sense.def:
Izraz
shall
uporabljamo tudi v vprašanjih, s katerimi nekaj predlagamo.

seg.quote: Shall we go and see a film?
We'll go forward a little more, shall we?
